description:
Download audio from YouTube, SoundCloud or Bandcamp.

You like to listen to music on YouTube, SoundCloud or Bandcamp and want to save it for offline playing. Or you want to download the soundtrack of a new movie. Then we recommend you to try out this software developed specifically for this purpose.
- fixed Spotify links parsing
- fixed downloads from Audiomack
- fixed downloads from Rutube
- fixed downloads from VK
- fixed incorrect audio language selection on YouTube
- improved overall stability
